result.arabic_text: ۞ وَتَرَكۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَمُوجُ فِي بَعۡضٖۖ وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَجَمَعۡنَٰهُمۡ جَمۡعٗا
result.translation: 99. Woo saakuy yaajuuj kee maajuuj tawqe gari garuk keenik amo awaquk amaaxuk agleh anuk ken cabna mangintak gexxaamah, kaadu magooqak ugutuh baanta fuxsunta ayro gino inkih kobxisiyyah kobxisna cisab kee galtoh.
